#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This is a browser based fighting game developed in gameQuery and jQuery inspired by MUGEN (famous fighting game engine).This is a client side game which is running on browser using javascript engine.


= Details =
This game can be played as multi player as well as single player modes.
